name: PurpleDream
description: Honoring the farewell of Purple Kiss. This token celebrates individuality, transformation, and the bold spirit of K-pop idols forging new paths.

name: InternCoin
description: From Anne Hathaway to Han So Hee—this coin flips internships into icons. Poised, ambitious, and full of potential, just like your portfolio should be.

name: FleissFi
description: Inspired by Hollywood's infamous madam, Heidi Fleiss. A scandalously stylish coin—flirty, fierce, and unapologetically in control.

name: YeriRise
description: Actress. Idol. Queen. Yeri's token captures the vibe of reinvention and lowkey rebellion. Retro chic with a hint of RED.

name: MysteryAgent
description: Season 2 is confirmed—but this token's mission is already live. Decode the chaos, invest in the unknown. Your crypto clue is AGNT.

name: InternTae
description: A love letter to clean office vibes, kimchi-tuned ambition, and that feeling when Taehyung wears glasses. Calm, pixel-perfect, irresistible.

name: DolbuDAO
description: Like Oh Seung-hwan’s mound presence—unmoving and zen. This token brings the 돌부처 mentality to your wallet: silent, strong, steady.

name: HotSauceDrop
description: Too spicy to copyright. Fueled by beat theft and unapologetic swag, this token is the sonic boom the meme world needed.

name: ForeverMichelle
description: First Lady. First Flame. Inspired by the Obamas' spark, this token reminds us: don’t fight the sexy—invest in it.

name: CrypticChopra
description: She posts. We decode. A token for those who love mystery, power, and drama—because in crypto, silence is bullish.

name: DolbuChain
description: As unshakable as the stone Buddha and more composed than a prosecutor at a press briefing. DolbuChain is here to zen your bags while justice unfolds.

name: SpecCoin
description: Too speculative for Wall Street, too spicy for the Blue House. Inspired by Korea’s hottest courtroom drama, this coin dodges questions with poise.

name: FreeYoon
description: A token for those who believe in bold leadership, even post-presidency. FreeYoon fights volatility with raw charisma and coffee-fueled conviction.

name: LoudSpeakerDAO
description: Broadcasting vibes across borders. Built for peace, protest, or just pure alpha. DMZ is the voice of a decentralized détente.

name: UFS Shield
description: Forged in drills and forged for thrills. UFS Shield brings you meme defense readiness for market invasions and rugpulls alike.

name: MetaMultiverse
description: One Korea, many cultures, infinite tokenized futures. Backed by integration, optimism, and a multilingual Discord.
